name: Lets Make Cup Cakes Free
description:
‘Let’s Make Cupcakes’ is a fun way to make numerous cupcakes, decorate them, eat them and photograph your awesome creations – All in one for FREE!

Choose from an amazing range of cup cake holders, cakes, frosting and decorations to create the perfect cupcake you always wanted to have!

You will definitely want to taste your fantastic creations and you can enjoy that experience by eating your cupcake and that too with three fun mouth choices!

Have your cake and eat it too! – You can take a photo of your cupcake masterpiece and save it to your photo album. Once you have done that you can dive in straight to savor the delicious cupcake.

Features:
*** Simple one-tap controls and an intuitive use interface for ease of play
*** Charming graphics
*** Over 20 cups, 24 cake types, 20 frostings and more than 50 decorations
*** Fun way to eat your cupcake
*** Photograph and save your cupcake creation in your photo album
*** Universal app! Enjoy on all iOS devices
